abstract: As Ford Motor awaits offers for its Jaguar and Land Rover brands, The New York Times takes a look atwhat has changed in the year since Alan R. Mulally left Boeing to be chief executive at the car maker.
lead_paragraph: As Ford Motor awaits offers for its Jaguar and Land Rover brands, The New York Times takes a look atwhat has changed in the year since Alan R. Mulally left Boeing to be chief executive at the car maker.

headline.main: Ford Stays the Course, Wherever It May Lead
